AMZN





> getSymbols('AMZN', from='2015-01-01')
[1] "AMZN"
> returns = dailyReturn(HLC(AMZN), type='log')
> data <- featureGen(AMZN, returns)
> targets <- coredata(returns)
> targets[targets>=0] = 1
> targets[targets<0] = -1
> targets <- as.factor(targets)
